code:
import{useState,useCallback,useRef}from'react';const DB_NAME='EditorStorage';const DB_VERSION=1;const DOCUMENTS_STORE='documents';/**
 * Hook de stockage de documents avec IndexedDB backend
 * API compatible avec localStorage mais persistant et robuste
 */export const useDocumentStorage=()=>{const[isReady,setIsReady]=useState(false);const dbRef=useRef(null);const migrationDoneRef=useRef(false);// Initialisation de la base de donn√©es IndexedDB
const initDB=useCallback(async()=>{if(dbRef.current)return dbRef.current;return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{console.log('üóÑÔ∏è Initialisation IndexedDB pour documents...');const request=indexedDB.open(DB_NAME,DB_VERSION);request.onerror=()=>{console.error('‚ùå Erreur ouverture IndexedDB:',request.error);reject(request.error);};request.onsuccess=()=>{console.log('‚úÖ IndexedDB initialis√©e avec succ√®s');dbRef.current=request.result;setIsReady(true);resolve(request.result);};request.onupgradeneeded=event=>{console.log('üîß Cr√©ation/mise √† jour structure IndexedDB...');const db=event.target.result;// Cr√©er l'object store "documents" s'il n'existe pas
if(!db.objectStoreNames.contains(DOCUMENTS_STORE)){const store=db.createObjectStore(DOCUMENTS_STORE,{keyPath:'key'});console.log('üìÅ Object store "documents" cr√©√©');}};});},[]);// Migration des donn√©es localStorage vers IndexedDB (une seule fois)
const migrateFromLocalStorage=useCallback(async db=>{if(migrationDoneRef.current)return;console.log('üîÑ Migration localStorage ‚Üí IndexedDB...');const transaction=db.transaction([DOCUMENTS_STORE],'readwrite');const store=transaction.objectStore(DOCUMENTS_STORE);// Lister les cl√©s importantes √† migrer
const keysToMigrate=['editorContent','editorViewMode','lastSaved'];let migratedCount=0;for(const key of keysToMigrate){const localValue=localStorage.getItem(key);if(localValue!==null){try{await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const putRequest=store.put({key:key,value:localValue,migratedFrom:'localStorage',migratedAt:new Date().toISOString()});putRequest.onsuccess=()=>resolve();putRequest.onerror=()=>reject(putRequest.error);});migratedCount++;console.log("\u2705 Migr\xE9: ".concat(key));}catch(error){console.warn("\u26A0\uFE0F \xC9chec migration ".concat(key,":"),error);}}}console.log("\uD83C\uDF89 Migration termin\xE9e: ".concat(migratedCount," \xE9l\xE9ments migr\xE9s"));migrationDoneRef.current=true;return transaction.complete;},[]);// Fonction getItem compatible localStorage
const getItem=useCallback(async key=>{try{const db=await initDB();// Migration automatique au premier acc√®s
if(!migrationDoneRef.current){await migrateFromLocalStorage(db);}return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const transaction=db.transaction([DOCUMENTS_STORE],'readonly');const store=transaction.objectStore(DOCUMENTS_STORE);const request=store.get(key);request.onsuccess=()=>{const result=request.result;const value=result?result.value:null;console.log("\uD83D\uDCD6 getItem(\"".concat(key,"\"):"),value?"".concat(value.length," chars"):'null');resolve(value);};request.onerror=()=>{console.error("\u274C Erreur getItem(\"".concat(key,"\"):"),request.error);// Fallback vers localStorage en cas d'erreur
const fallbackValue=localStorage.getItem(key);console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Fallback localStorage pour \"".concat(key,"\":"),fallbackValue?'trouv√©':'null');resolve(fallbackValue);};});}catch(error){console.error('‚ùå Erreur IndexedDB getItem, fallback localStorage:',error);return localStorage.getItem(key);}},[initDB,migrateFromLocalStorage]);// Fonction setItem compatible localStorage
const setItem=useCallback(async(key,value)=>{try{const db=await initDB();return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const transaction=db.transaction([DOCUMENTS_STORE],'readwrite');const store=transaction.objectStore(DOCUMENTS_STORE);const data={key:key,value:value,updatedAt:new Date().toISOString()};const request=store.put(data);request.onsuccess=()=>{console.log("\uD83D\uDCBE setItem(\"".concat(key,"\"):"),value?"".concat(value.length," chars sauv\xE9s"):'null sauv√©');resolve();};request.onerror=()=>{console.error("\u274C Erreur setItem(\"".concat(key,"\"):"),request.error);// Fallback vers localStorage en cas d'erreur
localStorage.setItem(key,value);console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Fallback localStorage pour \"".concat(key,"\" effectu\xE9"));resolve();};});}catch(error){console.error('‚ùå Erreur IndexedDB setItem, fallback localStorage:',error);localStorage.setItem(key,value);}},[initDB]);// Fonction removeItem pour compl√©ter l'API
const removeItem=useCallback(async key=>{try{const db=await initDB();return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const transaction=db.transaction([DOCUMENTS_STORE],'readwrite');const store=transaction.objectStore(DOCUMENTS_STORE);const request=store.delete(key);request.onsuccess=()=>{console.log("\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F removeItem(\"".concat(key,"\") effectu\xE9"));resolve();};request.onerror=()=>{console.error("\u274C Erreur removeItem(\"".concat(key,"\"):"),request.error);localStorage.removeItem(key);resolve();};});}catch(error){console.error('‚ùå Erreur IndexedDB removeItem, fallback localStorage:',error);localStorage.removeItem(key);}},[initDB]);return{getItem,setItem,removeItem,isReady};};
